info.title: Rankings
info.description: The Toornament platform connects your website and application with the eSports tournaments around the world.

get.description: Returns ranking items  with a small summary of the associated participant in the ranking. The items are always ordered by ascending position.

get.summary: Retrieve ranking items of a stage and tournament.
get.description: Returns ranking items of a stage with a small summary of the associated participant in the ranking. The items are always ordered by ascending position.

get.summary: Retrieve ranking items of a stage and tournament.
get.description: Returns ranking items of a stage with a small summary of the associated participant in the ranking. The items are always ordered by ascending position.

scopes.organizer:result: Grants the ability to edit match information and referee results.
Grants the ability to edit match information and referee results.

rankingItemRange.name: Range
rankingItemRange.description: A range of requested items using the 'items' unit. The size of the range can not exceed 50. (see [Pagination](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/overview/pagination))

tournamentId.name: tournament_id
tournamentId.description: The id of the tournament you want to retrieve data about.

stageId.name: stage_id
stageId.description: The id of the stage you want to retrieve data about.

id.name: id
id.description: The id of the requested ranking item.

userIds.name: user_ids
userIds.description: One or several player user ids involved in the ranking items to filter.

teamIds.name: team_ids
teamIds.description: One or several team ids involved in the ranking items to filter.

customUserIdentifiers.name: custom_user_identifiers
customUserIdentifiers.description: One or several custom user identifiers involved in the ranking items to filter.

stageIds.name: stage_ids
stageIds.description: A list of stage ids to filter.

stageNumbers.name: stage_numbers
stageNumbers.description: A list of stage numbers to filter.

groupIds.name: group_ids
groupIds.description: A list of group ids to filter.

groupNumbers.name: group_numbers
groupNumbers.description: A list of group numbers to filter.

participantIds.name: participant_ids
participantIds.description: One or several participant ids involved in the ranking items to filter.

tournamentIds.name: tournament_ids
tournamentIds.description: Only return ranking items for the given list of tournaments.

id.description: The id of the ranking item.

group_id.description: The id of the group associated to this ranking.

number.description: A number used as relative identifier within the ranking. It is determined from the seed attributed to the participant during the placement.

position.description: A position used for presentation purposes. It is always unique within the same ranking.

rank.description: The ranking of the participant in the ranking. Multiple participants can share the same rank if they are tied after involving all configured tiebreakers.

allOf.description: The participant identified with this item.

points.description: A number of points acquired by the participant in the ranking.

properties.description: A list of ranking metrics (see ranking properties).

tournament_id.description: The id of the tournament that contains this ranking item.

stage_id.description: The id of the stage that contains this ranking item.

custom_user_identifier.description: An external custom user identifier. Use the format that suits your needs.

custom_fields.description: The values of the custom fields configured in the tournament using the machine names as keys. For more information, please read the [Custom Fields](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/core-concepts/custom-fields) documentation.
